mapper.select: select count(id) count from Notice where ${field} like '%${query}%'
select * from notice where regdate > (select regdate from notice where id = #{id}) order by id , regdate limit 1
select * from notice where regdate < (select regdate from notice where id = #{id}) order by id desc, regdate desc limit 1
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, pub = #{pub}, hit = #{hit} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(title, content, memberId) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{id})
